entry.title: ORBIT True Wireless Stereo Speakers with Charging Dock
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rockstone
Type: Speakers
Price: 19.99

ORBIT by Rockstone Audio offers you the latest audio technology with left and right stereo sound for a comfortable listening experience. We have made sure to use the highest quality material to provide you with a stylish, durable, portable and lightweight speaker. You can rest assured that the ultra-loud 3W speaker is protected by the heavy-duty aluminum body. With Dual microphone in the speakers, you will never miss a call when your phone is out of reach as you can receive calls from the speaker itself. For your convenience, we have included a charging dock so you can charge both your speakers at the same time.
Features:
Upto 3 hours playtime
True wireless stereoÂ 
Frequency Response: 20HZ-20KHZ
Total Harmonic Distortion: <1%
Signal-to-noise Ratio: 80DB
Speaker Parameter: 6W (3W each)
Diameter: 36mm
Battery Size (each): 3.7V/400mAh
Bluetooth Version: V4.2
Product Weight: 70g
Package Content: 2 Speakers, 1 Base and Micro USB Cable.
